dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1952
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Several stories: unfair labor practices, a birthday party of a granddaughter, the public relations charade of organized labor, and a story of Peter Maurin's belief in labor as an "exchange of goods", not work for wages.
